From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>



* BrightBlade sighed in relief and pain as Gangon had dragged her over 
behind a boulder, the mech-fluid still gushing from the wounds in her 
chest-plate. She hated to fall back and under cover from a Maximal attack, 
but it was her own fault for underestimating her opponent and she was the 
result.
BrightBlade felt weak and began to shiver a little, she was not only loosing 
mech-fluid fast but she was loosing her temperature fast as well.
She was tired, covered in mech-fluid and dirt...and obviously stasis lock 
wasn't to far away if she sustained any other forms of major damage. But for 
now she just rested with her partner by her side and waited, biding their 
time until both of them could get back at the Maximals and let the slag hit 
the fan!
BrightBlade couldn't help but rest her head on Gangon's own        
chest-plate, she was so tired, cold and he was so warm. She closed her 
optics and if it wasn't for the explosions and charges going off around her 
she even might have fallen asleep right there, but now she just rested and 
silently waited until she could get back at the Maximal Tavatron who had 
done this to Gangon and herself, it would be a pleasant revenge!*
